name: Winter VN Jam 2022 Entry
description:
Alex, Sybil, and Lawrence have forgotten to bring a Christmas present for Alex and Sybil's tyrannical mom. Having forgotten their money as well, they decide to steal. You play as Alex in this short visual novel about these three thieves.

Credits:

Chou Chou - Character Art
Feral - BG Art
ApolloHY - Writing
Small Bunny - Programming

With music made by lolurio and alkacrab.
